Detailed Description

Secondary Vertex Class.

This class contains information about single secondary vertex. On one hand it can be used just for storage (as it was before 11/02/2011) On the other hand some operations can be performed (after 11/02/2011):

Significance calculation from vertex position, reference axis, and beam spot (was done in TMiniNtupleAnalyzer.cxx before)
  • Vertex refitting using information track information
